document_data.mainbody:
elavaundar was a member of the War Wizards of Cormyr, active in the mid 14 century DR.
In the , Delavaundar, alongside Marlegast, was assigned by Vangerdahast Aeiulvana, the Royal Magician of Cormyr, to dig for information on two of the newest members of the Knights of Myth Drannor. Then, the troupe bore the name of the Swords of Eveningstar, and its newest additions included "Pennae," or Alura Durshavin of Arabel, and Martess Ilmra. Delavaundar and Marlegast dug up both lasses family history and parts of their past, delivering the intel to Vangerdahast and his aide Laspeera Inthr√©.
